main: ^So bright! What the hell is this place?
^“Well, you are in my domain, of course!” She says with a cheery disposition
^She looks at the creature startled. “Who are you?! Why are you a wolf, and is this the afterlife?!”
^Aria: “Hi, I am Aria, I guess I'm your guide. No, I am not a dog, I am a wolf, and another no, this is not the afterlife.” She says in a fast-paced manner trying to answer every question.
^Ava: “Okay, talking wolf, maybe I have just lost it.”
^Aria: “Nope, you are A-Okay and in great timing because I need to get home.”
^Aria: “My sanctum, of course. Now let’s open the door.”
^Ava: “But I don’t want to, and you haven’t answered where we are.”
^Aria: “Ughh Fine, I’ll tell you the interconnected realms if you get in.”
^Aria: “Oh, I can be your personal guide and assistant. This will be so much fun, now open my sanctum, and I’ll explain everything you need to know.”
^Ava: “Fine, if you explain everything to me.”
^Ava: Now the first question, Interconnected realms all in a web of dimensions and realms creating what you call your reality” She explains with wonders in her words
^Aria: “Mortals like you haven’t gone to our realms in a while now but I’ve forgotten why. Hmmm…” Aria thinks, trying to remember something she probably forgot.
^Ava: “You know this place seems kinda nice just you and everyone else away from me plus this house sanctum that you have.”
^Ava: “Next question, we are in Dux Luminae the realm of illumination and guidance, and where my sanctum is located. It’s where I guide humans although vaguely to their destiny and fate.”
^Ava: “Maybe you’ve seen my work like the stone henge or the constellations in spite of the fact they shift every thousand years because of the off-centered rotation of your planet.”
^Ava: “I don’t remember anything about before I got here but all I know is that I don’t wanna go back.”
^Aria: “You can stay if you want, I’ve never had visitors before I think?.”

^Aria: “So what do you want to do? Constellation making? Divination granting? and oooh my favorite, guiding mortals to their manifestations.” As Aria talks about what the both of you can do, Ava feels different and her body changes for a bit until she returns to normal.“
^Aria: “That is not good whatever that is.”
^Ava: “What happened?” still a bit confused and disoriented.
^Aria: “Do you remember at least any before you got here?”
^Ava: “I was in a hospital I think? before that if I can’t remember why or when I was admitted nor any memories of my past.”
^Aria: “It seems we can’t remember stuff so you know what? Maybe we can visit Iris for some help.” She said excitedly.
^Aria: “Yeah, she could definitely help us, let me open my portal and maybe we can enter her realm.”
^Aria: “Oh I forgot, I’m your guide but I think you’ll understand her vibes and theme once we get there.” As she enters the portal toward apparently to Iris’.
^Ava: “Fine, It’s not like I have anything to do.” Ava enters the portal as well.
